mapper.sql: id, username, taskID, telnum, create_time, action_time, send_time, sendCode, pre_cost, cost, sucnum, status
mapper.insert: insert into tasks (id, username, taskID, telnum, create_time, action_time, send_time, sendCode, pre_cost, cost, sucnum, status, content, remarks) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), #{actionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sendcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preCost,jdbcType=REAL}, #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sucnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into tasks
id,
username,
taskID,
telnum,
now(),
action_time,
send_time,
sendCode,

cost,
sucnum,
status,
content,
remarks,

mapper.update:
update tasks
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
taskID = #{taskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telnum = #{telnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
action_time = #{actionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
send_time = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sendCode = #{sendcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pre_cost = #{preCost,jdbcType=REAL},
cost = #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sucnum = #{sucnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tasks set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, taskID = #{taskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telnum = #{telnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, action_time = #{actionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, send_time = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sendCode = #{sendcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pre_cost = #{preCost,jdbcType=REAL}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sucnum = #{sucnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tasks set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, taskID = #{taskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telnum = #{telnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, action_time = #{actionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, send_time = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sendCode = #{sendcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pre_cost = #{preCost,jdbcType=REAL}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sucnum = #{sucnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from tasks where username=#{username} order by create_time desc
select * from tasks where create_time BETWEEN #{begintime} and #{endtime} ORDER BY create_time desc
